title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Preventive maintenance process, preventive maintenance role in TQM, Introduction to RCM, system functions and failures, proactive maintenance, failure identification, RCM approach, RCM methodology, Application of RCM: examples and computers implementation.
